title: Katarina Pool Party Skin Teaser?
body: If you look at the splash art of Pool Party Ziggs, Under ziggs is Katarina. Does this mean there will be another set of Pool Party skins coming out including Pool Party Katarina?

replies.body: well also zac is seen on the diving board in one of the splashes so dont count it out. it would also tease darius and garens as well.

> [{quoted}](name=eznukezilla,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=h0hdsf1e,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-01T20:44:05.261+0000)
>
> well also zac is seen on the diving board in one of the splashes so dont count it out. it would also tease darius and garens as well.

It's sad though when they tease at possible future skins, because they end up looking NOTHING like they did in the first teaser.  Zac's is very different from what was seen in Renekton's splash, and same with Battlecast Kog'maw in Creator Victors.  I think they really need to keep them a bit consistent.
on thta note there is also pool party orianna nidalee vayne ahri ezreal and riven and diana that would be need to be made from the pool party splashes
